name: readPaymentCard(_:vasRequest:stopOnVASResult:eventHandler:)
desc: Presents a sheet to read both contactless payments and loyalty cards for a purchase or refund, and returns the relevant card data.
declaration: func readPaymentCard(_ request: PaymentCardTransactionRequest, vasRequest: VASRequest, stopOnVASResult: Bool, eventHandler: ((PaymentCardReaderSession.Event) -> Void)? = nil) async throws -> (PaymentCardReadResult?, VASReadResult?)
